original_text: He sent those animals a long way away. It would take Jacob three days to reach them. While this was happening, Jacob was taking care of Laban's other animals.
korean_text: 자기와 야곱의 사이를 사흘 길이 뜨게 하였고 야곱은 라반의 남은 양 떼를 치니라

sentences.original_text: He sent those animals a long way away
It would take Jacob three days to reach them
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 그곳에 도달하는 데는 3일이 걸릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Jacob was taking care of Laban's other animals
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 라반의 다른 동물들을 돌보고 있었습니다
